#maven2 distribution of the library.

= Introduction =

MascotDatfile is hosted at our public maven2 repository.

Add the following code into your pom.xml file:

{{{


    <!-- Repositores -->
    <repositories>

        <!-- UGent Genesis Maven 2 repository -->
        <repository>
            <id>genesis-maven2-repository</id>
            <name>Genesis maven2 repository</name>
            <url>http://genesis.UGent.be/maven2</url>
            <layout>default</layout>
        </repository>

    </repositories>

}}}
